result.footnotes: [1967]- i.e., the horses bearing riders as they race to attack the enemy.

result.translation: (2) And the producers of sparks [when] striking[1968]
result.footnotes: [1968]- Their hoofs while galloping over rocky terrain.

result.translation: (5) Arriving thereby in the center[1970] collectively,
result.footnotes: [1970]- i.e., penetrating into the enemy ranks during a surprise attack.

result.translation: (6) Indeed mankind, to his Lord, is ungrateful.
(7) And indeed, he is to that a witness.[1971]
result.footnotes: [1971]- Through his speech and his actions.

result.translation: (8) And indeed he is, in love of wealth, intense.

result.arabic_text: ۞ أَفَلَا يَعۡلَمُ إِذَا بُعۡثِرَ مَا فِي ٱلۡقُبُورِ
result.translation: (9) But does he not know that when the contents of the graves are scattered
(10) And that within the breasts is obtained,[1972]
result.footnotes: [1972]- i.e., when all secrets are made known.

result.translation: (11) Indeed, their Lord with them, that Day, is [fully] Aware.[1973]
result.footnotes: [1973]- Fully acquainted and familiar with everything about each one of them.
